titleStmt.title: The causes of God's vvrath against England, and a faithfull warning from the Lord to speedy repentance, fore-told by, and delivered in, a letter to the King, dated the 4th of the 7th month, 1663 by Charles Bayley ...
titleStmt.author: Bayley, Charles, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Friend's Library, London.
